API Reference

Top-level convenience imports

The package root re-exports the most common runtime entry points:

  • RunConfig

  • GenerateResult

  • TorchControllerConfig

  • ItergenSynthesizer

  • generate

  • compare_torch_vs_classic

  • get_sample_config

  • available_sample_configs

Runtime models

Public runtime models for the import-first API.

class itergen.api.models.TorchControllerConfig(lr=0.002, hidden_dim=48, weight_decay=0.0, min_mult=0.025, max_mult=0.075, trend_scale=0.7, ema_alpha=0.6, base_weight=0.01, device='cpu')[source]

Configuration for the torch-backed step-size controller.

Parameters:

  • lr (float)

  • hidden_dim (int)

  • weight_decay (float)

  • min_mult (float)

  • max_mult (float)

  • trend_scale (float)

  • ema_alpha (float)

  • base_weight (float)

  • device (str)

class itergen.api.models.RunConfig(n_rows=None, seed=None, tolerance=None, max_attempts=None, log_level=None, log_dir=None, save_output=None, output_path=None, attempt_workers=None, proposal_scoring_mode=None, missing_columns_mode=None, small_group_mode=None, collect_history=False, optimize_overrides=<factory>, rules_overrides=<factory>, use_torch_controller=False, torch_required=False, torch_controller=None)[source]

Top-level runtime options for synthetic generation.

Parameters:

  • n_rows (int | None)

  • seed (int | None)

  • tolerance (float | None)

  • max_attempts (int | None)

  • log_level (str | None)

  • log_dir (str | None)

  • save_output (bool | None)

  • output_path (str | None)

  • attempt_workers (int | None)

  • proposal_scoring_mode (str | None)

  • missing_columns_mode (str | None)

  • small_group_mode (str | None)

  • collect_history (bool)

  • optimize_overrides (dict[str, Any])

  • rules_overrides (dict[str, Any])

  • use_torch_controller (bool)

  • torch_required (bool)

  • torch_controller (TorchControllerConfig | None)

class itergen.api.models.GenerateResult(dataframe, metrics, quality_report, success, attempts, output_path, log_path, runtime_notes=<factory>, history=None, initial_dataframe=None)[source]

Result payload returned by high-level generation APIs.

Parameters:

  • dataframe (DataFrame)

  • metrics (dict[str, Any])

  • quality_report (dict[str, Any])

  • success (bool)

  • attempts (int)

  • output_path (Path | None)

  • log_path (Path)

  • runtime_notes (list[str])

  • history (list[dict[str, Any]] | None)

  • initial_dataframe (DataFrame | None)

objective()[source]

Return the objective score from the final metrics payload.

Return type:

float

Runtime orchestration

High-level import-first runtime API for synthetic dataset generation.

itergen.api.synthesizer.is_torch_available()[source]

Return True when torch can be imported in the runtime environment.

Return type:

bool

class itergen.api.synthesizer.ItergenSynthesizer(config, run_config=None)[source]

High-level facade for running config-driven synthetic generation.

Parameters:

  • config (Any)

  • run_config (RunConfig | None)

itergen.api.synthesizer.generate(config, run_config=None)[source]

Convenience function for one-off generation calls.

Parameters:

  • config (Any)

  • run_config (RunConfig | None)

Return type:

GenerateResult

itergen.api.synthesizer.compare_torch_vs_classic(config, run_config=None)[source]

Run classic and torch-requested flows for quick side-by-side comparison.

Parameters:

  • config (Any)

  • run_config (RunConfig | None)

Return type:

dict[str, GenerateResult]

Built-in sample configs

Sample YAML configurations stored as strings.

itergen.schema.samples.available_sample_configs()[source]

Return sorted names for all built-in sample configurations.

Return type:

list[str]

itergen.schema.samples.load_config(config)[source]

Parse and normalize a config from YAML text or dict input.

Parameters:

config (Any)

Return type:

dict[str, Any]

itergen.schema.samples.get_sample_config(name)[source]

Load one of the built-in sample configurations by name.

Parameters:

name (str)

Return type:

dict[str, Any]

Legacy flat-module imports (for example itergen.models and itergen.sample_configs) have been removed. Use canonical module paths such as itergen.api.models and itergen.schema.samples.
